1) 0x1b8 = 1 * 16^2 + b * 16^1 + 8 * 16^0 = 440 (binary 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 1011 1000)
2) 0x8 = 8 (binary 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 1000)
3) 0x14 = 1 * 16^1 + 4 * 16^0 = 16 + 4 = 20
4) 0xfffffe58 = -2,147,483,647  (binary 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1110 0101 1000)
15 * 16^31 + 15 * 16^30 + 15 * 16^29 + 15 * 16^28 + 15 * 16^27 + 14 * 16^

8 * 16^0 + 5 * 16^1 + 14 * 16^2 + 15 * 16^3 + 15 * 16^4 + 15 * 16^5 + 15 * 16^6 - 15 * 16^7
